defaultz: device_config put game_overlay com.dts.freefiremax mode=2,downscaleFactor=0.8:mode=3,downscaleFactor=0.8,device_config put game_overlay com.dts.freefireth mode=2,downscaleFactor=0.8:mode=3,downscaleFactor=0.8
lows: device_config put game_overlay com.dts.freefiremax mode=2,downscaleFactor=1.8:mode=3,downscaleFactor=0.8;device_config put game_overlay com.dts.freefireth mode=2,downscaleFactor=1.8:mode=3,downscaleFactor=0.8
medium: device_config put game_overlay com.dts.freefiremax mode=2,downscaleFactor=2.5:mode=3,downscaleFactor=0.8;device_config put game_overlay com.dts.freefireth mode=2,downscaleFactor=2.5:mode=3,downscaleFactor=0.8
ultra: device_config put game_overlay com.dts.freefiremax mode=2,downscaleFactor=3.8:mode=3,downscaleFactor=0.8;device_config put game_overlay com.dts.freefireth mode=2,downscaleFactor=3.8:mode=3,downscaleFactor=0.8
extreme: device_config put game_overlay com.dts.freefiremax mode=2,downscaleFactor=15.0:mode=3,downscaleFactor=0.8;device_config put game_overlay com.dts.freefireth mode=2,downscaleFactor=7.0:mode=3,downscaleFactor=0.8
